decision_conditions: The proposed non-material amendments to 223459FUL dated 20/12/2022 can be ACCEPTED as non-material amendments, in accordance with section 96a of the Town and Country Planning Act (1990), Government Guidance Greater flexibility for planning permissions (2010) and the Ealing Council Protocol for Non-Material Amendments following a grant of Planning Permission (2011).
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment (S96a) to planning permission ref: 223459FUL dated 20/12/2022 for: Redevelopment of site to provide nine four storey townhouses; associated landscaping, car and cycle parking, and refuse storage (following demolition of the existing workshops). Amendment seeks to replace Juliette balconies on 1st and 2nd floor levels across Block A and Block B front elevations with vertical double-height fins; and to omit windows to gable ends and replaced with Flemish bond brick patterning using the same mystique brick selected to match the rest of the external walls; to omit all rooflights on roof topand windows ; and alteration on the ground floor.
